mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.job_number jobNumber, a.user_name userName, u.company_name companyName, q.department_name departmentName, p.job_name jobName, a.state, a.entry_time entryTime, a.work_time workTime FROM sys_eve_user_staff a, company_job p, company_department q, company_mation u WHERE a.id NOT IN ( SELECT b.staff_id FROM sys_staff_archives b ) AND a.company_id = u.id AND a.department_id = q.id AND a.job_id = p.id
AND a.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND a.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'

SELECT a.id, a.archives_number archivesNumber, a.custody_place custodyPlace, a.archives_center archivesCenter, a.state archivesState, DATE_FORMAT(a.archives_time,'%Y-%m-%d') archivesTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.remark, a.enclosure, a.whether_archives whetherArchives, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, c.company_name companyName, a.management_unit managementUnit, d.`name` educationName FROM sys_staff_archives a LEFT JOIN company_mation c ON a.management_unit = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.education_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND a.staff_id = #{staffId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_archives (id, archives_number, management_unit, custody_place, archives_center, archives_time, education_id, whether_archives, state, remark, enclosure, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{archivesNumber}, #{managementUnit}, #{custodyPlace}, #{archivesCenter}, #{archivesTime}, #{educationId}, #{whetherArchives}, #{archivesState}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.archives_number archivesNumber, a.custody_place custodyPlace, a.archives_center archivesCenter, a.state archivesState, DATE_FORMAT(a.archives_time,'%Y-%m-%d') archivesTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.remark, a.enclosure, a.whether_archives whetherArchives, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, a.management_unit managementUnit, c.company_name companyName, a.education_id educationId, d.`name` educationName FROM sys_staff_archives a LEFT JOIN company_mation c ON a.management_unit = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.education_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND a.id = #{id}
